name: Magi Prota (pre-alpha 0.2)
description:
Just trying to make a magic-fps, rpg game with a vibe similar to daggerfall

the game's mechanics will center around melee, offensive spells and defensive / utility spells and customizing the loadout to the mouse's left and right buttons 

Controls:

WSAD move, mouse look

Left click: main-hand

Right click: off-hand

E: interact

Mousewheel Up: change equip layout

Mousewheel Down: exit equip layout

ESC: quit
